name: デデデ大王のデデデでデンZ
summary: Dedede's Drum Dash Deluxe is a stand-alone Nintendo eShop software that is a sequel/successor to the Kirby: Triple Deluxe sub-game, Dedede's Drum Dash. Like the original, Dedede's Drum Dash Deluxe features King Dedede as the main character and has him bouncing on drums to the rhythm of a song. New songs are added, including secret levels to challenge the player.
info:
• 中文名: 迪迪迪大王：节拍跃动Z

  • 平台: 3DS
